name: Flying Ninja (Arputikos)
description:
Flying Ninja is an arcade game about a ninja who can run on walls!  The Ninja wants to get to the top of the tower! You control the ninja and you have to jump from one wall to another while not touching obstacles. 

Watch out! Running speed is increasing!

PRO TIPS: (if you want to beat me!)
- Focus. You have to concentrate. Don't get distracted by environment!
- Be prepared for fast jumping burst when the obstacles will be shorter than usually do.
- Don't blink: you can miss the right moment to jump
